Class Player

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResources(ResourceList addList)
      incremented values in player resourcelist by inputting a resourcelist addList must be nonempty
      boolean canBuildCity()
      checks if player has the prerequisite resources to build a city
      boolean canBuildRoad()
      checks if player has the prerequisite resources to build a road
      boolean canBuildSettlement()
      checks if player has resources required to build a settlement
      boolean canBuyDevCard()
      checks if player has resources to buy a devcard
      boolean canMakeTrade(TradeOffer offer)
      checks if player can make a TradeOffer to another player offer must be nonempty.
      void robberEvent()
      triggers by a player rolling a seven or a robber being moved to a hex tile controlled by a player forces a player to discard half of his resource list if his resourcelist total is greater than seven

    • Method Detail

      • robberEvent

        public void robberEvent()
        triggers by a player rolling a seven or a robber being moved to a hex tile controlled by a player forces a player to discard half of his resource list if his resourcelist total is greater than seven

      • addResources

        public void addResources(ResourceList addList)
        incremented values in player resourcelist by inputting a resourcelist addList must be nonempty
        Parameters:
        addList - resourceList containing the resource numbers to be added to player resourcelist

      • canBuildCity

        public boolean canBuildCity()
        checks if player has the prerequisite resources to build a city
        Returns:
        true if player has necessary resources, else false

      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad()
        checks if player has the prerequisite resources to build a road
        Returns:
        true if player has resources, else false

      • canBuildSettlement

        public boolean canBuildSettlement()
        checks if player has resources required to build a settlement
        Returns:
        true if player has resources, else false

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard()
        checks if player has resources to buy a devcard
        Returns:
        true if resources are present, else false

      • canMakeTrade

        public boolean canMakeTrade(TradeOffer offer)
        checks if player can make a TradeOffer to another player offer must be nonempty. TradeOffer must involved this player object
        Parameters:
        offer - trader offer to check resource amount against
        Returns:
        true if player can make a trade, else false2
